Name: Cold Land
About the game: Cold Land is a Walking Simulator game, where you control a bear trying to find its cub. Walk through a beautiful stylized snow environment and contemplate beautiful landscapes. Features Short experience (you can complete the game in one shot) Walk and Run Roar to activate runes and release new areas Collect essences Stylized graphics
